name: General Bel Iblis
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting a non-[Episode 1] corvette or a stolen starship, adds one battle destiny and it is immune to attrition < 5. ''Exiled'' (placed out of play) if at Corellia. Once per game, may steal a dreadnaught from opponent''s Lost Pile into hand.',
